descriptionHtml:
my interpretation of a skyrim-sith character. feel free to change him using the \"showracemenu\" command. He has a two handed variant of the red lightsaber if you need it. I \'psb-ed\' this character, meaning he has all spells shouts and words (sorry if i ruined it for you). i also gave him relatively good clothes/armor stats, he is level 5 i believe and has just talked to Gerdur. he has the upgrade enchated weapons/armor perk (sorry again). Enjoy!

Required mods:

Magicka Sabers by Lord Haun 

recommended mods:

JoO Jedi Robe by xxxNEOxxx
(for a possible jedi character)

Be a better mage with unique spells by concept 83
(for fans of conjuration)

--read various mod descriptions for info as to using them
author: eveisawesome11
